title: Movie Database Website
description: This website was created for a web development course I took at Carleton. It has a Node.js server, stores and uses data from a MongoDB database I created using open-soruce data. It also maintains a JSON REST API which allows GET and POST requests to the database.

title: HeartWave Simulator
description: This was the final course project for COMP 3004: Object-Oriented Software Engineering. I worked with 3 other team members to create a heart rate detector simulator. The device monitors the heart rate variability (HRV) of the simulated heart rate graph, and displays the key metrics like the coherence level.
